jd: From: Ashok, Sunar Tech ashok@sunartech.com Reply to: ashok@sunartech.com Hi,Hope you are doing great!!!Please revert me resume and details ASAP.Title: Senior Data Analytics EngineerLocation: Austin, TXDuration: LongtermNeed only 12+ years of exp candidates• Migrated 200+ Oracle reports to DB2 using SQL (CTEs, complex queries, joins).• Designed reports for Frontline using Oracle SQL Developer and JasperSoft Studio.• Led Tableau integration from Oracle, centralizing curated datasets using custom SQL queries.• Leveraged Python for automation of third-party assessment data integration.• Designed and managed bidirectional ETL pipelines connecting AWS, Snowflake, and Tableau using Tableau Prep and Snowpipes.• Managed ad-hoc data requests, conducted A/B tests, and provided excellent customer service through comprehensive reportdesign.Thanks,AshokSunar Tech Solutions, Inc.E-Mail : ashok@sunartech.com
